page.title: 06Home life.
page.content: {Russell's Weekend.} When I get up on Saturday morning I wash my face, brush my teeth and put on my clothes. After breakfast we go shopping for our week's supply of food. When we come home I watch football on televison. If it's a good day I will go out to play on my bike. When it's tea-time I put my bike away and get my tea. After tea I watch television for a while, then I go to bed at about ten o'clock. When I get up on Sunday I have my breakfast and go to Sunday School. We learn about Jesus and other people in the Bible. After dinner, we sometimes take a trip to Walls in our car and caravan. After tea we go to church. When I come home I do my reading. Before I go to bed at about nine o'clock, I brush my teeth and wash my hands and face. RUSSELL GAIR.
